4.2.7.hardeningScript:
reg add "HKLM\Software\Policies\Google\Chrome\WindowManagementAllowedForUrls" /v "1" /t REG_SZ /d "<URL_1>" /f
reg add "HKLM\Software\Policies\Google\Chrome\WindowManagementAllowedForUrls" /v "2" /t REG_SZ /d "<URL_2>" /f
:: Note: Replace <URL_1>, <URL_2>, etc., with the specific, approved URLs that should be allowed window management permissions.

4.2.8.hardeningScript:
reg add "HKLM\Software\Policies\Google\Chrome\WindowManagementBlockedForUrls" /v "1" /t REG_SZ /d "<URL_1>" /f
reg add "HKLM\Software\Policies\Google\Chrome\WindowManagementBlockedForUrls" /v "2" /t REG_SZ /d "<URL_2>" /f
:: Note: Replace <URL_1>, <URL_2>, etc., with the specific URLs that should be blocked from using window management permissions.
